name: Sophie Adams
summary: Experienced Data Analyst with a background in the education sector. Skilled in leveraging Power BI for actionable insights and data-driven decision-making.

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Developed interactive dashboards in Power BI to track student performance metrics, resulting in a 15% increase in graduation rates.

experience.title: Research Analyst
experience.description: Analyzed survey data using statistical tools to identify trends in teaching methodologies, leading to the implementation of a more effective curriculum.

projects.name: Student Success Dashboard
projects.description: Created a Power BI dashboard to monitor student attendance and grades, contributing to a 10% improvement in student retention rates. Tools: Power BI, SQL.

projects.name: Teacher Performance Analysis
projects.description: Conducted a comprehensive analysis of teacher evaluations data, resulting in targeted training programs and a 20% increase in student satisfaction scores. Tools: Excel, Power BI.
